Paragraph: Oxidative cyclization of 1 in the presence of iron(III) chloride carried out in diluted dichloromethane ( DCM ) solution yielded a dark purple benzodithiophene-4,5-diketone ( 2 ) crystal.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| --- |
| 1 |
| iron(III) chloride |
| dichloromethane (DCM) |
| benzodithiophene-4,5-diketone (2) |

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":
